metadata.title: Arrest de la cour du parlement, qui condamne deux libelles intitulés, l'un: Le bon sens, l'autre: De l'homme, de ses facultés intellectuelles & de son éducation; à être lacérés & brûles par l'exécuteur de la haute justice. :

metadata.description: The first work is by Paul Henri Thiry, Baron d'Holbach; and the second by Claude Adrien Helvétius
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Damaged, torn, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Title page and cover are combined.
